edge: Started as childhood sweethearts, continue their relationship at St. Teresa's College after Mia transfers there.
Rohan wins the college over by showcasing his sports skills and begins a relationship with Mia at St. Teresa's College.
Became friends with the reigning 'Student of the Year' and son of a wealthy school donor, Sukesh Singh Randhawa at St. Teresa's College.
Father of Manav and a wealthy school donor at St. Teresa's College.
Initially at odds due to Shreya's pranks, but later helped by her to make amends with his old friends at Pishorilal.
Popular girl at St. Teresa's College and sister of Manav.
Spotted getting intimate with Manav by Rohan, leading to his expulsion from St. Teresa's College and a brutal beating by Manav and his friends.
Deliberately planted by Manav to spoil Rohan's image, leading to Rohan giving him a tight slap for stealing her.
Initially insulted and discouraged him, but later impressed by his sincerity at Pishorilal.
Convinced him to join her in a national dance competition and falls in love with him at St. Teresa's College.
helps her make amends with his old friends and falls in love with her as they practice for a national dance competition.

refuses to get back together with Rohan when Mia tries to kiss him.
fights against in an inter-school multi-event tournament, ending in Rohan's teammate Abhishek being badly injured.
